data.text:
An International Bestselling author (" Video Game Careers Demystified" hit #1 on Amazon Kindle in multiple categories including Computer Games Programming, Children's Computer Games in over 7 countries; "Expert's Cure: How Entrepreneurs Are Changing the World" hit top 5 Business Book on USA Today and #2 on the Wall Street Journal bestseller list) Angel Investor, mind reader and brand/category marketer, Michael S. Chang loves to tell powerful stories and move hearts and minds. Michael has published and marketed emerging technology for Software companies like Autodesk, Pubmatic, and Citrix. He feels especially privileged and honored, having worked with video game publishers RockYou, Jagex, and EA. VIDEO GAME TITLES which he has worked on include: - Ultima - RuneScape - Mass Effect - DungeonKeeper - Pieces of Flair - ZooWorld - Warhammer - FIFA Ultimate Team - Supreme Heroes - Drop Squad the Escape - DabKick His International Bestseller "Video Game Careers Demystified: The Trifecta of Creators, Athletes, and Ecosystem in a Thriving Industry" informs and educates young gamers with a "God's eye view" of what it's really like to develop and publish games. By quoting experts who worked on icons like Halo, Assassin's Creed, Battlefield, and ABC mouse - this book encourages young people to look within themselves, and to explore turning their passions into lifelong pursuits in gaming, the arts, technology, and beyond. In the USA Today and Wall Street Journal bestselling book-anthology "Experts Cure: How Entrepreneur's Cure" Michael feels honored to be a bullhorn and scribe - telling the stories of world-changing entrepreneurs like Christine Outram of Everydae (who is transforming traditional college and SAT prep into something highly accessible, interactive, and fun), Amir Bozorgzadeh of Virtuleap (who uses virtual reality brain training games to reverse the effects of aging-related cognitive degeneration from Alzheimers, Parkinson's, and dementia) and Chris Thomas of Fusion Odyssey (who uses sports psychology to help youth athletes take full ownership and hack the emotional, psychological, and intellectual elements of the mental game, in order to execute personal bests on the playing field and in life.) Michael is a bona fide nerd with an undergraduate degree in Robotics and Ethnic Studies from the University of California, Berkeley and a MBA in Marketing from the University of Southern California. When not following in the footsteps of his favorite authors Malcolm Gladwell and John Grisham, Michael loves channeling his inner Steph Curry on a basketball court and his spirit chefs Masaharu Morimoto and Jose Andres.
